articles.description: David Ortiz and the six other members of the Baseball Hall of Fame Class of 2022 will be inducted in Cooperstown, New York, on Sunday.
articles.content:
• Seven members will be inducted Sunday into the Baseball Hall of Fame Class of 2022
  • The players inducted include David Ortiz, Minnie Miñoso, Tony Oliva, Buck O'Neil and Gil Hodges

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Woeful Red Sox concede inside-the-park grand slam in record 28-5 loss to Jays - The Guardian
articles.description: Raimel Tapia hit an inside-the-park grand slam and the Toronto Blue Jays set a franchise record for runs, rolling past the Red Sox 28-5 on Friday night
articles.content: Raimel Tapia put his head down and started a slow jog to first base, not sure hed gotten the pop he wanted when he drove a bases-loaded fly ball to deep center field in the third inning. Then everyth… [+3854 chars]

articles.author: Deivarayan Muthu
articles.title: Fluent Shubman Gill's re-emergence another reminder of India's enviable bench strength - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The competition for places in the national side is cut-throat, but for now, he has earned the chance to try and sneak ahead of the others
articles.content: FeatureThe competition for places in the national side is cut-throat, but for now, he has earned the chance to try and sneak ahead of the others
